content:
As a follow-up to yesterday's meeting, I've made a set of diagrams that illustrate what I expect the overall topology of registries to look like in general as well as two scenarios/patterns I expect we'll see in registry usage.
image.png
Dotted lines in the diagrams represent registries which use but do not fully mirror an upstream registry's content.

Here's a sketch of how some of this registry stuff might look in practice in conjunction with WASI and the id fields that go in component binaries: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1ISDpC2CJ6p1dVac0K6FFnLnvgtznaJ8OqcpKpyMc20Y/edit#slide=id.g20e8226c8c0_0_336
